summary: This mod contains 12 new custom races that can be applied to both new and existing characters.
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=6][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/12315]Special Edition Version Available[/url][/size][/b]
[size=5]Also available (if you're a freak and want more CaNcer):
[b][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/87075]Crimes against Skyrim by lazyradly[/url][/b][/size]

(CaN) Crimes against Nature 5.1.1

This mod contains 12 new custom races that can be applied to both new and existing characters.
---------------------------------------------------------------
Not required, but highly recommended:

[url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]SKSE[/url]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3863]SkyUI[/url]
    Needed for MCM and a few fixes

 [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71214]Unofficial Skyrim Legendary Edition Patch[/url]
    Fixes a Dark Brotherhood Quest for custom races

[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/86900]Player Blink Fix[/url]
    Fixes player blinking

FOMOD installer includes plugins for the following:
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26393]Vilja in Skyrim[/url]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/40960]INIGO[/url]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/2180]Sofia - The Funny Fully Voiced Follower[/url]

----------------------------------------------------------------
Load Order:
    Crimes against Nature.esm
    Other CaN Plugins
----------------------------------------------------------------
FAQ:

Can I reupload this mod elsewhere?
    Sure.

Can I modify your mod / fix it / make my own version?
    Yes, script source is included.
    IMPORTANT:  You do not have permission to use anything in this mod for commercial purposes.

Will my save be unusable after uninstalling this mod?
    It'll be fine provided you switch to a default race before uninstalling.  I can't promise anything if you use additional CaN plugins though.

What does 'RGA' mean?
    'Reversed Gender Animations'.  It will swap your character between the male and female animation sets.

What Happened to Tommy?
    He gets his own separate plugin now.

I'm using an old mod that changes all the NPCs into ponies, now they're all screaming and shitting themselves, WTF DID YOU DO?!
    [size=4][b][url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Pt-UZMf1aqU]I have altered the mod.  Pray I don't alter it any further.[/url][/b][/size]

PS4 Version?
    Nope, sorry.
author: FancyPants

files.name: CaN 5.0.2 FOMOD Installer
files.changelogHtml:
Quad Pony race now uses vanilla horse animation paths, silent horse animations now overwrite defaults
New voice quest added for vanilla horse race

files.name: CaN 5.1 FOMOD Installer
files.changelogHtml:
Updated all bipedal skeletons to use Groovtama's XPMSE
(All races should be good to go for weapon positioning and RaceMenu stuff)

files.name: CaN 5.1.1 FOMOD Installer
files.changelogHtml:
All children skeletons updated slightly (necks were too long)
Pony and Phony FormIDs swapped (Y'all pony freaks got NO chill)
